definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to throw stones at sb who fell down a well (idiom); to hit a person who is down
to throw stones at sb who fell down a well (idiom); to hit a person who is down

sentences.english: Conflow supplies high pressure underground equipment for coal mines.
sentences.chinese: 康福路为煤矿领域提供井下耐高压产品。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the situation of underground debris flow in Chengchao Mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了程潮铁矿几次井下泥石流发生情况。

sentences.english: The spontaneous combustion of coal seam endangers the safe production.
sentences.chinese: 井下煤层自燃严重危害着安全生产。

sentences.english: The paper introduced a new developed long distance control system for ventilation door in underground mine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种新研制的煤矿井下自动风门远程控制系统。

sentences.english: Water pouring is an important factor endangering mine.
sentences.chinese: 井下涌水是危及矿井安全的重要因素。

sentences.english: Are Chinese reporters really so eager to flog their British peers?
sentences.chinese: 中国传媒真的这么渴望对他们的英国同行落井下石吗？

sentences.english: Methods The animal's model of injury caused by gas explosion was made in imitating coalpit tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 方法建立模拟煤矿井下瓦斯爆炸伤动物模型。

sentences.english: The logging cable stuck is a prevailing downhole accident in the open hole logging .
sentences.chinese: 电缆粘卡是裸眼井测井中最容易发生的井下事故。

sentences.english: How did they survive the ordeal? Have a close look?
sentences.chinese: 试看他们如何井下生存。

sentences.english: On the right, that gangsters and anti-social elements are taking advantage of tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 右翼则认为，抢匪和反社会分子乘此机会落井下石。

sentences.english: Twenty miners were trapped underground after the gas explosion.
sentences.chinese: 瓦斯爆炸后有二十名矿工被困井下。

sentences.english: Analysis on the factors influencing stress-strain of mining field and mine roadway;
sentences.chinese: 采场管理是矿山井下生产工作中的一个关键性环节。

sentences.english: The miners are staying down for pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们在井下静坐罢工，以要求增加工资。

sentences.english: A downhole tool used to cut tubing or similar tubulars that have become stuck in the wellbore.
sentences.chinese: 割断已卡在井筒的油管或类似管子所用的井下工具。

sentences.english: He sat by the window ruminating on recent underground accidents.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在窗旁反复思考最近发生的井下事故。

definition: waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
